title: AWS Lambda to Amazon S3
description: This SAM template creates a Lambda function that writes to an S3 bucket when invoked.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This SAM template creates a Lambda function that writes to an S3 bucket when invoked. Once you run `sam deploy --guided`, you will enter the name of the destination bucket for the objects to be stored.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.headline: Presented by Daniele Frasca
authors.name: Daniele Frasca
authors.bio: I am Daniele Frasca serverless enthusiast. I build and architect serverless applications at scale.
